author: Brett Samuels
title: Trump jokingly moves away from Birx after she reveals she had a fever
description: The coordinator of the White House coronavirus task force on Monday revealed she was tested for the virus over the weekend after running a low fever, prompting President Trump to jokingly shuffle away from her.Dr....
